title: Wear FlashLight/Party/Police
summary: Mobile Flashlight and Wear Flashlight with Party Lights and Police Lights
description: This basic flashlight uses your phones flash as a light. Features:- Works on Android Wear Devices- Party and Police lights on Watch- Light turns on automatically when you open the app and turns off when you exit- Works on all phones with a flash- Widget to quickly turn on the light- Free and easy to useFlashlight will install on mobile and watch if you have one.If you have any problems or suggestions, you can reach us at hcstudios@outlook.com.au
descriptionHTML:
This basic flashlight uses your phones flash as a light.

Features:
- Works on Android Wear Devices
- Party and Police lights on Watch
- Light turns on automatically when you open the app and turns off when you exit
- Works on all phones with a flash
- Widget to quickly turn on the light
- Free and easy to use

Flashlight will install on mobile and watch if you have one.

If you have any problems or suggestions, you can reach us at hcstudios@outlook.com.au
comments: Wear Flash light/party/police Very nice and useful App. This basic flashlight uses your phones flash as a light. Light quality is good. Very helpful. Easy to use
Simple app that does what it says.
Great. Very nice flashlight app with simple interface. It's very helpful.
